# LDtkFileFull.FromFile method

Loads the ldtk world file from disk directly using json source generator.

```csharp
public static LDtkFileFull FromFile(string filePath)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| filePath | Path to the .ldtk file. |

## Return Value

Returns the file loaded from the path.
